channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A World Without Airbnb & Why “Sinking” Could Cause Your Insurance to Skyrocket
item.description: Airbnb bans escalate, a “tsunami” could be coming for this real estate niche, and “sinking” cities lead to skyrocketing insurance prices. The housing market changes every week, so we’re here […]

item.title: CrowdStrike update causes major IT outage, taking out banks, airlines and businesses across the world
item.description: Businesses across the world are reporting IT outages, including Windows “blue screen of death” errors on their computers, in what has already become one of the most widespread IT disruptions in recent years. The outage — linked to an update rolled out for widely used security software made by cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike early on Friday […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Love Beyond Bars: Jules and Samantha
item.description: Jules and Samantha Werkheiser fought their wrongful convictions for over a decade. Here’s their journey of survival — and motherhood — in pictures.

item.title: Rookie Reply: Buying Your NEXT Rental & How to Save a Fortune on Renovations
item.description: Home renovation projects aren’t cheap, and it’s easy to let your budget spiral out of control if you’re not careful. Fortunately, we have several tips, tricks, and hacks that will […]

item.title: Paytm loss widens and revenue shrinks as it grapples with regulatory clampdown
item.description: Indian fintech Paytm’s struggles won’t seem to end. The company on Friday reported that its revenue declined by 36% and its loss more than doubled in the first quarter as it continues to grapple with a regulatory clampdown that has significantly curtailed business at its payments bank subsidiary. Once the poster child of India’s startup […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Meet the New Generation of Unarmed First Responders in this New Podcast Series.
item.description: “The Fifth Branch,” a podcast from The Marshall Project and Tradeoffs, examines new, alternative ways to respond to 911 crisis calls.

item.title: Using “ADUs” to Go From Firefighter to FIRE by His Late 30s
item.description: You could be missing out on the chance to earn passive income from your home (and other rentals!) with a “no-brainer” money move. This investing strategy is picking up steam […]

item.title: Fandango founder dies in fall from Manhattan skyscraper
item.description: J. Michael Cline, the co-founder of Fandango and multiple other startups over his multi-decade career, died after falling from a Manhattan hotel, New York’s Deputy Commissioner of Public Information tells TechCrunch. The New York Police Department responded to 911 calls from the Kimberly Hotel, a 30-story hotel on 50th street in midtown Manhattan on Tuesday […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: What We Know About J.D. Vance’s Legislative Action on Criminal Justice
item.description: On immigration and more, Vance has defended and legislated former President Donald Trump’s policy goals.

item.title: How to Find, Evaluate, and Offer on Rental Properties in 2024
item.description: Want financial freedom through real estate? Then, you’ll need to know how to buy a rental property. Don’t worry; even as a beginner, you can take three basic steps to […]

item.title: Apple Vision Pro debuts immersive content featuring NBA players, The Weeknd and more
item.description: Apple on Thursday announced its upcoming lineup of immersive video content for the Vision Pro. The list includes behind-the-scenes footage of the 2024 NBA All-Star Weekend, an immersive performance by The Weeknd, new series, films, concerts and more. The headset launched in February with more than 150 3D movies and immersive titles. Apple is adding […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How a Supreme Court Ruling Could Affect a Case Involving Police Abuse of Youth
item.description: Another court must now decide how the landmark ruling will impact the Boy Scouts abuse settlement, which involves victims of police sexual abuse.

item.title: Elon Musk is now a villain in Joe Biden’s presidential campaign
item.description: Biden centering Musk in his campaign is a notable escalation, considering he spent most of his presidency seemingly pretending the billionaire didn't exist. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Jackson, Mississippi, Wants Curfew Centers to Cut Crime. Here’s What Other Cities Learned.
item.description: After a teen’s murder, city officials hope a curfew and youth centers will get kids off the street. Young people are skeptical.
